LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_GarrisionCap.label: garrision cap
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_GarrisionCap.description: a soft cap for service man when combat helmet is not required.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_GarrisionCoat.label: garrision coat
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_GarrisionCoat.description: A typical coats for army, keep one warm in chilly weather.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_HazardSuit.label: hazard suit
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_HazardSuit.description: A large garment that conceals the wearer's entire head and body. worn as protection against hazardous materials.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_PowerSkelton.label: power skelton unit
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_PowerSkelton.description: Physical enhancement equipment from array of neural prosthetic skeltons. It can increase the wearer's carry weight and mobility with effectively.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_UnitSuit.label: uniform
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_UnitSuit.description: a jumpsuit uniform for colonization fleet crew member and standard combat unit.
